snippet: The arrests of several officials have threatened the fragile government of Prime Minister Petr Necas, which has already been shaken by a series of disagreements.
abstract: Czech police charge Jana Nagyova, senior aide of Prime Min Petr Necas, with abuse of office and bribery; charges appear to be part of the most sweeping anticorruption operation since the Czechs overthrew Communism in the Velvet Revolution of 1989.

byline.contributor: Hana de Goeij contributed reporting from Prague.

lead_paragraph: The arrests of several officials have threatened the fragile government of Prime Minister Petr Necas, which has already been shaken by a series of disagreements.

headline.main: Czech Police Charge Officials in Corruption Investigation
headline.print_headline: Czech Police Charge Officials in Corruption Investigation
